title: BNP Paribas India Partners with Adhar NGO for CSR Initiatives
description: BNP Paribas India has opened a new dormitory for female residents at Adhar, an NGO that supports intellectually disabled adults. The facility will accommodate over 55 women and 18 staff members, enhancing Adhar's mission of providing comprehensive care. This initiative reflects BNP Paribas India's commitment to improving lives.
